General.Name: Reitmans Canada Ltd
General.Description: Reitmans (Canada) Limited primarily engages in the retail sale of women's specialty apparel in Canada under the Reitmans, Penningtons, and RW&CO brand names. The company also offers apparel for men. It serves customers through retail and e-commerce channels. Reitmans (Canada) Limited was founded in 1926 and is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 250 SauvE Street West, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3L 1Z2
